list_definition.mean_english: người phục vụ ở quán rượu
list_definition.definition: a person who serves at the bar of a pub or hotel

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She works as a barmaid at the De Freville Arms pub.

list_ex_of_english: The barman and the barmaid are at work, and with the traditional "mine host" they are entitled to our protection.
Hotel staff, barmaids and so on are badly paid.
The same occurred with regard to barmaids.
If so, what did the barmaid say to him?
They number about 1,500, 900 of whom are part-time—mostly barmaids, barmen, hotel staff and cleaners.
Is the barmaid, or barman, particular about personal hygiene.
The same people grumble to the grocer and his staff about a ½p increase on a pound of butter but tip the barmaid every time they buy a drink.
I say that it is no place for barmaids; it is a place for barmen, not for barmaids.
